"He kā, he iwi, he mākau, he lupe, ua lako ka ipu a ka hoʻokele"

ʻO Dale Codero ke kāne, ʻo Kassy Nohea Astrande ka wahine. Noho pū lāua a hānau ʻia ʻo McKenzie Kananioaloha Tim Sing ma Hilo i ka ua Kanilehua. He kama na ka Pūnana a puka aku mai ke Kula ʻo Nāwahīokalaniʻōpuʻu. He haumāna ʻimi i ke kekelē Laepua ENV Studies ma ke kulanui ʻo Kaminaka ma Oʻahu.
